name: Project Sirens
description:
IMPORTANT: Be sure to go into Windows Settings -> Privacy -> Speech and turn on Online speech recognition before using.

Project Sirens is a demo game I created for a class which wraps up early December. It is a simple Real-Time Strategy game which I used to test out implementing voice controls in Unity. Originally designed for use with wit.ai (the only free cloud solution I could find), it now uses Unity's interface with Cortana. If there is enough interest I will look into interfacing with Siri and Google Assistant as well.

Delta Squad Attacking the Enemy
